name: ACE
description:
The grid. A sky. The 80s.

"ACE" is a collaboration between Christiaan Janssen and Norman Ritter alias Alpha Boy. An audio-visual experience.

Made by:

Christiaan Janssen: graphic, progamming

Norman Ritter: concept, sfx and music

Developed at the Berlin Mini Game Jam September 2015

Soundtrack by Alpha Boy:

https://alphaboymusic.bandcamp.com
